definition: meal cooked in a large pot/communal meal/(fig.) system that rewards everyone equally regardless of merit
to be willing to sacrifice everything one has (idiom)
humpbacked (e.g. a bridge)/in the form of an arch/a hunchback
(lit.) a pot of porridge/(fig.) a complete mess

sentences.english: Small and portable, the iron cauldron was once used as a field cauldron, according to experts.
sentences.chinese: 据专家介绍铁釜是一种行军锅，它体积小，便于携带。

sentences.english: If you're affluent, you can also put a lemon slice after discharge into the pot boil .
sentences.chinese: 如果你富裕，你也可以把锅后，煮到放电的柠檬片。

sentences.english: Mind how you carry that pot; you'll spill some of the water out.
sentences.chinese: 端那只锅的时候当心一点，不然会把水泼出来的。

sentences.english: Cover and boil 3 to 5 minutes longer or until crisp-tender.
sentences.chinese: 再盖锅煮3到5分钟或更长直到变得清脆细嫩。

sentences.english: Put eggs into an empty pot and add in pinch of salt.
sentences.chinese: 把鸡蛋放到煮锅中，加入稍许盐。

sentences.english: We do just the same, except that we use saucepans.
sentences.chinese: 我做的也一样，不过我们用的是锅。

sentences.english: We still need a boiler in our kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我们的厨房还需要一个煮锅。

sentences.english: Fill a large high-sided skillet with 1 inch water.
sentences.chinese: 取一个较深的煮锅，倒入1英寸深的水。

sentences.english: Use Amway's cooker make dishes not only delicious but also healthy.
sentences.chinese: 安利皇后牌不锈钢锅煮出来的食物不仅美味而且健康。

sentences.english: News of this middle-aged man's sudden passing nearly broke the Web.
sentences.chinese: 这个中年男人的突然离去让整个网络世界炸开了锅。

sentences.english: After an hour or so, wash the pot as normal.
sentences.chinese: 大约一个小时之后，像平常一样把锅清洗干净就行了。

sentences.english: Is also the March Eighth delivers you ten catties iron. Boils the pot nutrition soup makes up the calcium the blood tonic.
sentences.chinese: 又是三八节，送你十斤铁熬锅营养汤，补钙又补血。

sentences.english: She was braising beef in a covered pot.
sentences.chinese: 她正用一个盖严的锅焖牛肉。

sentences.english: A pot of yellow rice with fish. Do you want some?
sentences.chinese: 有锅鱼煮黄米饭。要吃点吗？

sentences.english: The boiling soup subsides when the pot is taken off the heat.
sentences.chinese: 把锅从炉子上端开时，汤就不再沸腾了。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, heat remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil in the heart cocotte over medium heat.
sentences.chinese: 同时，用中火和桃心铸铁锅加热另外一汤勺橄榄油。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
fish head/fig. upright and unwilling to compromise
